summary: A comedy centered on an Indian mother who takes her obsession with marriage into the world of serial murder.
cast: Sanjeev Bhaskar|Steve Morphew|Steve Jones|Jamie Sives|Sendhil Ramamurthy|Mark Addy|Shabana Azmi|Goldy Notay|Sacha Shilov|Teghvir Gujral|Harry Rance|Ray Panthaki|Jack Gordon|Shaheen Khan|Lalita Ahmed|Saraj Chaudhry|Adlyn Ross|Ash Varrez|Zoë Wanamaker|Sally Hawkins|Don Warrington|Jimi Mistry|Sanjeev Kohli|Hardeep Singh Kohli|Martin Healey|Amer Chadha-Patel|Michael Tarat|Amit Shah|Harvey Virdi|Madhav Sharma|Ace Bhatti|Preeya Kalidas|Christopher Simpson|Mo Sesay|Toby|Pepper|Britain|Greg Bennett|Catherine Balavage|Kumiko Kaur Chadha Berges|Ronak Singh Chadha Berges|John Edward|Tashie Jackson|Sahil Kumar|Garry Marriott|Nikita Mistry|Shane Nolan|Dennis Santucci|Atul Sharma|Avinashi Sharma|Chris Wilson
title: It's a Wonderful Afterlife
